channel.title: RsPs Anime
channel.description: Would it be possibly to emulate a selected anime onto Runescape's system? I've thought for many months about making a Naruto game with customs maps, items, etc.. But how would jutsu and other spells work? It's just been a thought that's been passing through my mind for several months now. Also if you don't think it'll work out. Which type of system would you recommend.

item.title: RsPs Anime
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

you could do it if you cared enough
i would advise you to spend your time and money on rehab - cure yourself from anime

Read full topic

item.title: RsPs Anime
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Good luck making ninjas in a game with 0.6 s ticks. RS isn’t a good engine to use for anything but RS. Unless you just want a reskin of RS into something Anime-ish.

Read full topic
